file_content.text: Thanks again for all your help, buddy.
I've been hearing some serious comm chatter, pal! Sounds like you made a mess in the Justicar tower!
Did you find any recordings of Rikael? Don't keep me in suspense!
Here you go, Paus--straight out of the Justicar detention center.
I found a holovid of Rikael.
Terrific. Let's see what you found.
Rikael's story didn't unfold quite the way you thought it did.
You aren't going to like this.
Well, that doesn't sound too good. Let me see what you've got here.
This recording will reveal to all of Coruscant the truth about the Justicars.
You've got quite a story here!
I knew it! We're going to take these Justicars to the curb! Let's see what you found.
What about my pay?
Hey, buddy, come on, it's me. Don't worry. Your credits are right here. Let's have a look.
Oh no! Rikael, you snake! No wonder your parents won't talk about you, you little thug!
Great. My whole story, shot to pieces. That little jerk was my best lead. Now I've got nothing to go on.
Even if this lead didn't work out, you're still right about the Justicars.
Don't give up, Paus.
Tough break.
That's not my fault.
No, no, you were great, buddy. I know.
I won't let this keep me down. I'll find the proof. Just got to stick it out a little longer down here, that's all.
Anyways, thanks for all your help. Keep fighting the good fight! I'll see you around.
This is perfect! This is going to change the world, baby, the whole galaxy!
Once everyone sees the truth about the Justicars, the Republic will squash them like bugs, and freedom will reign! All thanks to you!
It was nothing.
This was just one more victory for freedom over tyranny.
I know, I know--I'm a hero.
Ah! That's a great opening line! You're a natural, baby. I'll see you around.
Yeah, that's really great, Paus. Really great.
Whatever you say.
I gotta think of a story title right away... hope I see you around.
Look for interrogation droids in the Justicar tower, and find one with recordings of Rikael. They'll be in the detention center. For freedom, buddy!
Oh, man! A Jedi, in the flesh! Perfect, this is perfect!
A soldier? Special Forces? Oh, beautiful, baby, beautiful! Just what I need!
Whoa, look at you! You're perfect, just perfect!
So, my name's Paus, right, and I'm a journalist. The only journalist down here who isn't afraid to dig up the truth!
I'm on to something major with these Justicars. I'm gonna blow the lid on all their tyranny and oppression, and show all of Coruscant what they really are!
That's a noble goal.
I'm glad you think so, too, my friend.
What do you know about the Justicars, Paus?
What are the Justicars?
They're all about abuse of power. They're the big guy, pushing the little guy down.
I try not to argue with lunatics. If you say you're onto something, that's great.
Whatever you say.
Hey, if it's crazy to love freedom and hate totalitarian thugs like the Justicars, then yeah, I'm plenty crazy.
I'm working on a major scoop. A clear-cut case of wrongful arrest, illegal imprisonment and unjust execution!
Proof I need is just out of reach, though. I need a fearless hero to get that evidence. I need you!
Just tell me what needs to be done, Paus.
I'd be glad to help.
I knew you were the one! You're a fighter, baby, fighting the good fight!
Why me?
Because I can tell! You're brave, you're tough! Everything a hero of freedom and justice should be!
No way--too dangerous.
Nah! You can wipe the floor with these Justicars, trust me. You can go all the way, I just know it!
Rikael Lysannis. Son of a wealthy family, arrested and executed without trial or explanation. He's the key to everything--the catalyst, the dirty little secret.
Nobody's talking about Rikael's death. Not the Justicars, not his family, nobody. So I need the facts, straight from the source: the Justicar tower. And that's where you come in.
I'll find out the true circumstances of this poor boy's death, Paus. Perhaps then, justice can be served.
I will uncover the truth.
Yeah! And not the Justicars' jack-booted justice, either--the real thing!
Odd. Why do you think the boy's parents won't speak on the matter?
Rikael's family isn't talking?
I'm sure the Justicars got to them--told them they were dead meat if they talked to anybody.
Infiltrate, search and seize--understood. What will I be looking for?
I'm always ready for duty.
Let's be clear--my expertise comes at a price.
I don't work for free.
Oh, hey, of course, no problem. We've all got to cover the bills, right? I'll make it worth your while, don't worry.
What's in the Justicars' tower that will prove your suspicions?
What needs to be done?
You want me to charge into a highly secure facility to do what, exactly? Look around?
Why would I do this?
You better believe it, buddy. We're going all the way, here, all the way!
Interrogation droids. They're the key. Justicars use 'em all the time, and they record everything they see.
Find the droid that recorded Rikael, smash it and yank the memory core. You can check the core on the Justicar computers, to make sure you've got the right one.
I'll take care of it.
Couldn't I bring the memory core back to you? Can't you read the thing?
Why can't you check it?
But what if you end up with the wrong one? You wouldn't want to have to fight your way back in.
I think you need to find someone else to get your evidence, Paus.
I can't do this for you.
But what about freedom? Striking a blow against tyranny and evil? The oppressed masses need you!
If innocent people are suffering, then something must be done.
You're right--let's do this.
I guess I could help.
Yeah! You're going to make this happen, I know it!
All right, then. Soon as you've got the recording I need, bring it back here and we'll show Coruscant the truth about these Justicars! Good luck, buddy, good luck!
No way, Paus. [Refuse quest]
Ah, no! Right through the heart, buddy, right through the heart!
Fine. The truth will come out, one way or another. Forget you, pal.
Sorry, pal, I'm busy.
